page.title: 05Cropwell Bishop Stables
page.content: The {Cropwell Bishop stables}are situated on the main road quite near Mill Hill.They stable Hunters, and the hunt meets at Cropwell Bishop every year.{Prince Charles}once rode in it.The stables are owned by Mr.Tom Barlow who was invited to the wedding of {His Royal Highness Prince Charles {to Lady Diana Spencer}. Prince Charles wanted to buy Mr.Barlow's horse ,Lulu, but Mr.Barlow wanted to keep it. Mr.Barlow's brother, Harold Barlow owns a butcher's shop,also on the main road.His grand_father came from Keyworth and bought the original business in the year{1892.}This man had a large family of{ten}children who all settled in the village,one,a son,inherited the shop and in turn his son,Harold Barlow has the shop now in 1985. {Author:Olivia Corden,aged 11yrs.
